item.title: Roar Collab Quickstart
item.description: Overview Roar Collab is Penn State’s High-Performance Computing (HPC) Cluster. In this post, I will lay out the basic tools needed to use it. Here, I assume: You have already created an account and have access. Otherwise, follow the official documentation for instructions. Basic knowledge on Linux and using the comand line/bash shell. If not, check “Command Line Basics”. For the remainder of this tutorial, I will refer to Roar Collab as Rcollab.
